Class TextCompositor

  • Object
    • TextCompositor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextChartCompositor, TextNumberCompositor

    public class TextCompositor
extends Object
    Arranges to composite standard text fonts onto BufferedImages for MV-CoDA
    Author:
    tony

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CoOrd coOrd
      Simple value object for coordinate
      (package private) static String fontName
      The given family name for this font, as returned by a call to getAvailableFontFamilyNames()
      (package private) static int fontSize
      The size of the font
      static Logger LOGGER
      A logger for this class
      private String text
      The text to be rendered by the font
      Font textFont
      The font to use

        public static void getLocalFonts()

      • overlayNextFontFrame

        public BufferedImage overlayNextFontFrame(boolean imOut,
                                 BufferedImage videoFrame)
                                   throws GFXElementException
        Checks to see if an overlay is required onto an image, and arranges overlay if so
        Parameters:
        imOut - does the current iteration require an overlay
        videoFrame - the image to overlay onto
        Returns:
        the composited image
        Throws:
        GFXElementException - if the overlay couldn't be accesed

      • nextText

        private BufferedImage nextText(boolean imOut,
                     BufferedImage videoFrame)
                        throws GFXElementException
        controls the composition of the text overlay
        Parameters:
        imOut - does the current interation require an overlay
        videoFrame - image to overlay onto
        Returns:
        the composited image
        Throws:
        GFXElementException - if the overlay couldn't be accessed

      • renderText

        private void renderText(BufferedImage image,
              String text,
              Font font,
              int x,
              int y)
                 throws GFXElementException
        Renders text to image
        Parameters:
        image - image to write onto
        text - characters to print
        font - font to print in
        x - at x coord in image
        y - at y coord in image
        Throws:
        GFXElementException - if the overlay couldn't be accessed
